title: Metis Eastern King Bed
description:
The low profile of this Metis bed creates a luxurious aesthetic and will create the illusion of a larger room. Modern industrial styling is both substantial and plush, with clean lines that make a cool and effortless look in your bedroom. Not lacking in quality, it is upholstered in buttery soft top grain leather and the metal legs offer design and support. Available in two finishes gray and pink.

title: Doris Eastern King Bed
description:
Masculine yet soft, the Doris bedroom collection is edgy and inviting all in one. The leather upholstered bed can fit with an industrial, vintage, or modern bedroom easily. The headboard features horizontal channel tufting to adds some support while leaning against it while reading or watching TV. The neutral finish is cozy and inviting and makes it easy to style around. Sitting on sturdy metal legs for maximum stability.

title: Juvanth Eastern King Bed
description:
A perfect mixture of industrial vibe and rustic charm, the Juvanth Collection incorporates sturdy metal frame and warm wooden accents into its design. The brilliant bed is founded atop a strong metal base paired with wooden side rails and a slatted headboard, while six space-saving drawers offer additional storage in the bottom. Matching case goods like nightstand, dresser, chest are also charming and practical, adding stylish storage to this collection. Let Juvanth Collection fills your personal space with cozy, comfortable elements.

title: Picardy Queen Bed
description:
The Picardy bedroom collection brings the influence of European antiques to life with vintage traditional style, and a gorgeous cherry oak finish. The hand-applied finish enhances the beauty of the detailed woodwork and oversized scrolled moldings. The arched bed features tufted upholstery on the headboard and footboard. This elegant collection will surely bring true splendor into your home.

description:
Sleep like royalty with this Versailles Bed Set. The bedroom set was inspired by old European design. The bed features carved scrollwork accent with nailhead trim Decor and tufted upholstery on both headboard and footboard. The accent pieces crafted in wood with cherry oak veneer finish, and also include regal features such as ample storage, beveled mirror, Felt-Lined drawers, and brown copper finish hardware.
